description:
An adaptive AI IDE that transforms how you work, collaborating with you to run faster.

Trae (/treÉª/) is your helpful coding partner. It offers features like AI Q&A, code auto-completion, and agent-based AI programming capabilities. When developing projects with Trae, you can collaborate with AI to enhance your development efficiency.
- Improvements in TRAE Skills:
  - Supports both global Skills and project-level Skills
  - Skills can be enabled or disabled
  - Skills are supported in IDE mode and custom agents

- Added IntelliJ keybindings to the onboarding flow and Settings

- Rendered LaTeX formulas in AI Chat conversation flows
- Added menu bar support to the macOS version of TRAE
- Added support for project-level MCP capabilities
- Removed the Fast Apply tool from the SOLO Builder Document Agent
- Excluded AI-executed terminal commands from the terminal history
